Package de.hardcode.jxinput.keyboard

Connects Swing keyboard handling to the JXInput infrastructure.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
JXKeyboardInputDevice Virtual input device treating a AWT keyboard as a source for Buttons.
 

Exception Summary
InvalidKeyCodeException Exeception to be thrown if keycode is not in then range [0,255].
 

Package de.hardcode.jxinput.keyboard Description

Connects Swing keyboard handling to the JXInput infrastructure.
